item.title: Roivant Sciences Ltd 10-K
item.description: Roivant Sciences Ltd, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 28, 2022 had 84293 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 1226 instances product - 1046 instances products - 594 instances candidates - 563 instances clinical - 527 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
